title: Solutions we offer!
text: We provide Live Bootcamps, Recorded Classes, Events & Workshops to support our offerings.

section.title: Full-Stack SDET Bootcamp
section.content: Learn to work on Web, Mobile, API, Database, Performance testing using two different tech-stacks one based on Java & other on JavaScript. If Interested, Register using top menu link.

section.title: Free Automation Architect Bootcamp
section.content: We are running this free bootcamp on Every Sunday, 2 hours. Here we discuss Architectures of different products from QA/SDET's perspective. If Interested, Register using top menu link.
